Hi,

There is one option in settings called bind-address: 

So my question is can I put here multiple comma separated IP addresses...

If I bind 10 IPs to my machine and I want each outgoing request would go with new IP address [ one of the IP of my machine ]....

Can I use with this option for this purpose or is there any way to do this...

Thanks in advance...


Regards,

Jigar Patel
